### Airバス for Helicopter Components Repair and Overhaul

#### Request for Proposals

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), is issuing a request for proposals (RFP) to provide repair and overhaul services for components installed on Airbus helicopters.

--- Summary of the Project ---

* **Reference Number**: WS3744601880
* **Publication Date**: June 30th, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 17th, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 30th, 2024
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)

---

**Scope of Work:**

The RCMP requires repair and overhaul services for components installed on its fleet of Airbus helicopters. The service provider shall provide maintenance and repair services to ensure the components meet the required operational and safety standards.

---

**Key Requirements:**

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunities**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

---

** Tender Evaluation Criteria:**

* The proposal with the **low price** will be selected for award.

---

 **Contact Information:**

For any questions or concerns regarding this RFP, please contact:

**Rick Long**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: rick.long@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

You can find more information on the Ariba Discovery platform at:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16737558?extsite=MTY3Mzc1NThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

---

**Other Paging:**

Please note that the tender closing date has been amended to July 17th, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT. All bids must be submitted on or before this date and time.

All proposals submitted after this date and time will be declared non-responsive.
